thought: To craft an iron_pickaxe, I need to craft oak_planks, and then craft sticks. To craft oak_planks, I need to craft jungle_planks. I will move the jungle_planks from slot 45 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
